dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4270 IH: To clarify that funding for the standard setting body designated pursuant to section 19(b) of the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Investor Protection Corporation, and the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board is not subject to the sequester.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Renacci (for himself, Mr. Himes, Mr. Conaway, Mr. Peterson, Mr. Murphy of Florida, Mr. Flores, and Mr. Sherman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To clarify that funding for the standard setting body designated pursuant to section 19(b) of the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Investor Protection Corporation, and the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board is not subject to the sequester.

section.text: Section 251A of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (2 U.S.C. 901a) does not apply with respect to the funding ofâ€”

paragraph.text: the standard setting body designated pursuant to section 19(b) of the Securities Act of 1933 (15 U.S.C. 77s(b));
the Securities Investor Protection Corporation; or
the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board.
